title: Ending The Eternal (xvid - gory horror short)
description:
Samuel Gradius is settling himself down for a quiet night of sleep, unaware that the icy fingers of death are about to creep into his apartment. Can he survive the night? 

Shot on HD and featuring top notch FX talent (from teams that worked on Silent Hill, Dawn of the Dead (remake), Land of the Dead, etc.) and art direction from Kevin Hutchinson, ENDING THE ETERNAL is experimental horror at its finest. 

Adding to the atmosphere and tension is an original score written by Rob Kleiner, from the well-loved underground band Tub Ring.
